item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, March 16, 2025 at 7:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Generate impressive-looking terminal output, look busy when stakeholders walk by (111 points | 35 comments)
2. Show HN: Nash, I made a standalone note with single HTML file (303 points | 70 comments)
3. Apple's long-lost hidden recovery partition from 1994 has been found (99 points | 5 comments)

5. Career Advice in 2025 (129 points | 43 comments)
6. Sign in as anyone: Bypassing SAML SSO authentication with parser differentials (228 points | 82 comments)
7. Wyvern's Open Satellite Feed (145 points | 3 comments)
8. Implementing "Tennis for Two" using op amps (2024) (5 points | discuss)
9. Milk Kanban (338 points | 138 comments)
10. Finding Signal in the Noise: Machine Learning and the Markets (Jane Street) (107 points | 75 comments)
11. DeepSeek focuses on research over revenue in contrast to Silicon Valley (8 points | 8 comments)
12. Strengthening AI Agent Hijacking Evaluations (27 points | 7 comments)
13. Mandelbrot Set Explorer (48 points | 13 comments)
14. Hyperion (Tree) (20 points | 10 comments)
15. They're Close to My Body: A Hagiography of Nine Inch Nails and Robin Finck (2020) (105 points | 53 comments)

17. Lego says it wants to start to bring video game development in-house (77 points | 45 comments)
18. Evidence that Neanderthal and Homo sapiens engaged in cultural exchange (73 points | 39 comments)
19. Learning physics while monitoring vibrations of the Earth with seismic phenomena (5 points | discuss)
20. ESP32 WiFi Superstitions (72 points | 44 comments)
21. Sunset Geometry (2016) (90 points | 10 comments)
22. Lemma for the Fundamental Theorem of Galois Theory (124 points | 32 comments)
23. Computers and Mice – Mister Rogers Neighborhood (101 points | 29 comments)
24. AutoHete: An Automatic and Efficient Heterogeneous Training System for LLMs (35 points | discuss)
25. Show HN: A personal YouTube frontend based on yt-dlp (228 points | 152 comments)
26. Parahelp (YC S24) Is Hiring Founding Engineers (SF) ( | hide)
27. What Bikini Atoll Looks Like Today (2017) (142 points | 67 comments)
28. Show HN: Aiopandas – Async .apply() and .map() for Pandas, Faster API/LLMs Calls (40 points | 7 comments)
29. Arbitrary-Scale Super-Resolution with Neural Heat Fields (137 points | 48 comments)
30. A look at Firefox forks (523 points | 342 comments)
